did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Notes from Albinus' Lectures on Anatomy at Leyden

address.addressline: Hanna Holborn Gray Special Collections Research Center

did.abstract: Formal lecture notes in Latin, taken by John Manning, from Bernhard Siegfried Albinus' lectures on anatomy at the University of Leyden.

prefercite.head: Citation
prefercite.p: When quoting material from this collection, the preferred citation is: Albinus, Bernhard Siegfried, Notes from Albinus' Lectures on Anatomy at Leyden, Crerar Ms 39, Hanna Holborn Gray Special Collections Research Center, University of Chicago Library

scopecontent.head: Scope Note
scopecontent.p: Holograph, formal lecture notes in Latin, taken by John Manning, from Albinus' lectures on anatomy at the University of Leyden. Headed by: "Albini Professoris Anatomici Leydensis Dictata." I) "Historia Anatomia"; II) "In Propriam Osteologiam Albins Dictata," with sections on "De Arteria," "De Venis," and "De Pulmonibus," etc.; III) "Neurologia"; IV) "De Partibus Naturalibus," with sections on "De Morsus," "De Liene," "De Visu," "Osteogenea," etc. Includes dealer's listing, tipped in. Inscribed: "Presented by the Executors of the late Dr. Manning." Ex libris: "Joannes Manning, M.D.," and "Norwich and Norfolk United Medical Book Society." Bound in one-quarter red calf, with marbled paper over boards.
